title: Request: POST ///combinations on a repository
description: Describes the request body of a request to create a new combination of ontologies or mappings

nodes.description: A list of ontology iris to combine. This can also be models or specifications in supported formats.

items.description: A resolvable iri of an ontology

combination_name.description: The name the ontology, that represents the combination, will have.

file_name.description: The filename of the resulting distributed ontology. If it is not set the default filename will be assumed.

commit_message.description: The commit message of the resulting commit. If not supplied will default to a commit message that will describe the ontologies and mappings.
